sourcesContent:
This component is inserted from Binder

seems to call the class for each interpolation

This is an interpolated String : {{interString}}

This is an interpoldated Number: {{interNumber}}

This is from a method: The time is {{isBeforeThree()}}

Inner Text says that it is

You can set my color in the component!

My color is {{ fontColor }}

Two Way Binding on NgModel:

Binded: {{userString}}
